basics.summary: BBA Candidate in Management Information Systems, Minor in Computer Science || Fall 2023

education.area: Management Information Systems, Minor in Computer Science
courses: Introduction to Computer Science I & II

work.summary: Summer 2023 Software Engineer Intern on the Intelligent Document Processing team
highlights: Collaborated with the AI/ML team to develop the Intelligent Document Processing Application, which utilized Azure Form Recognizers API to scan and extract data from insurance forms.
Implemented C# ASP.Net backend functionalities to handle data extraction, validation, and storage processes, ensuring efficient and accurate processing of insurance forms.
Conducted rigorous testing and debugging to identify and resolve software defects, improving the overall reliability and performance of the application using frameworks such as xUnit and Moq.
Contributed to the documentation of the application, including technical specifications, user manuals, and troubleshooting guides, facilitating future development and maintenance.

work.company: Research Computing Facility at the University of Hawaii at Manoa
highlights: Provided technical assistance to faculty and staff for all University-related computer and network systems, including hardware and software setup, troubleshooting, and repair
Coordinated with vendors and other IT staff to ensure efficient operation of university computers and networks.
Installed, configured, and maintained computer and network infrastructure such as workstations, servers, switches, routers, and firewalls

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013
